summary: AN ORDINANCE correcting drafting errors to the ordinance (Ordinance 119956) amending the Boost Program; repealing Ordinance 119956; repealing and reenacting Sections 1, 4, 5, and 8 of Ordinance 119602, and repealing Section 11 of Ordinance 119602 to finalize design for a pilot small business contracting program and to clarify the process to be used for the program; and codifying the Boost Program as Chapter 20.49 of the Seattle Municpal Code.
